name: Tank Team
description:
Tank Team, the ultimate game of cooperation, coordination and most importantly: communication.

Assemble a team of up to 8 players (recommended 2 minimum) and operate your tank by doing tasks, such as rotating the barrel, loading the shells, setting the power and pressing FIRE!

However, only one member of your team can see outside the tank at a time, so you're going to need precise communication to land your shots...

The last team standing, wins!

Key Features

  • Host games of up to 10 teams
  • Earn money to unlock cool cosmetics
  • Play on a variety of different maps, each with their own gimmick
  • Try out multiple quirky gamemodes
  • Built in text and voice chats
  • Simple gameplay, the difficulty comes from communicating effectively with your team

And don't forget: Teamwork makes the tank work!
